cards.title: Architectural,Civil & Structural
cards.description: A modern high-rise building under construction, showcasing architectural, civil, and structural engineering elements. The scene includes scaffolding, cranes, and a city skyline backdrop.

cards.title: Mechanical & Piping
cards.description: An industrial setting highlighting mechanical and piping engineering. The image features complex pipe networks, large machinery, and engineers working on equipment with tools and blueprints visible.

cards.title: HVAC & Clean Room
cards.description: A detailed depiction of HVAC and clean room engineering in an industrial environment. The image shows HVAC units, ventilation ducts, and a controlled clean room with workers in clean suits, air quality monitors
